tags.name: lrndesign-imagemap
tags.description:
`lrndesign-imagemap`

Events:

  * `simple-modal-show` - 

Attributes:

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the imagemap

  * `src` {`string`} - The path of the SVG

  * `hotspot-details` {`any[]`} - The path of the SVG

  * `subtopic-of` {`string`} - optional: the id of the heading element that this imagemap is a subtopic of

  * `tag` {`string`} - optional: if subtopicOf is not set, start the content at a heading tag, eg. <h1/>, <h2/> ...

Properties:

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the imagemap

  * `src` {`string`} - The path of the SVG

  * `hotspotDetails` {`any[]`} - The path of the SVG

  * `subtopicOf` {`string`} - optional: the id of the heading element that this imagemap is a subtopic of

  * `tag` {`string`} - optional: if subtopicOf is not set, start the content at a heading tag, eg. <h1/>, <h2/> ...

  * `_template` {`HTMLTemplateElement | null`} - 

  * `_importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `rootPath` {`string`} - 

  * `importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `root` {`HTMLElement | ShadowRoot | StampedTemplate | null`} - 

  * `$` - 

  * `PROPERTY_EFFECT_TYPES` -

attributes.description:

Property: label

tags.name: lrndesign-imagemap-hotspot
tags.description:
`lrndesign-imagemap-hotspot`
creates an accessible image map

Attributes:

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the hotspot

  * `hotspot-id` {`string`} - Id of hotspot element inside the SVG

Properties:

  * `label` {`string`} - Label for the hotspot

  * `hotspotId` {`string`} - Id of hotspot element inside the SVG

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
`label` {`string`} - Label for the hotspot

Property: label

Default: null

attributes.name: hotspot-id
attributes.description:
`hotspot-id` {`string`} - Id of hotspot element inside the SVG

Property: hotspotId

Default: null
